column5: At home my computer shows posts with all the replies below.  at work, the replies in the posts are links and i have to click each one to read the different replies.  How do i change it so that it loads all replies on the page automatically like my home computer?

The old board use to have an options button to change display views.  Try this:  Click on your username on the top right corner and the click settings.  The last setting on that page should be display view.  Change it to look like a forum not like a list.  Afterwards click save changes.
I have the same problem, Governator's solution didn't work for me
Try this link: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?app=core&module=usercp&tab=forums  The last setting on that page "Topic Display Mode" change it to Standard and click save changes.
Yep, that's the one you want.
